name: DayCare Facility Management Tool

screenshots.caption: This will be the new graphic design of the program
This is the new graphic design for the detailed view of the family info
This is the new layout for the Status Info Update/Add

short_description:
This is a base package for a Childrens daycare management package. It has the basic functions that can be used as a base foundation to build features to run any size facility. In it you will find attendance tracking, and pickup functions. 
We are planning more features as the project grows. The newest feature of the SaaS version of the program will include a messaging system that displays a reminder message to a parent or a global message to all parents. Also, there will be a way to post a balance to the parents. These are the two most requested features that are being added.
We see this package going a long way with the number of downloads that are being recorded. Thanks!

We are beginning work on version 1.2 of the product. The release date is set for Oct 1, 2014.
summary: Daycare management program for running of a daycare facility
